medical_history.chief_complaint: A 6-year-old girl presented with bluish nodes on her right thigh and over the right patella, causing slight discomfort.
medical_history.history_of_present_illness: The symptoms began at birth and have been slowly increasing in size since then, causing slight discomfort.
medical_history.family_history: Multiple family members of the paternal line have similar bluish-to-livid nodular lesions, with a reported family history of the same skin lesions in the paternal great-grandfather.
